numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice a fact about admissions to Ivy League colleges.
3. People with low incomes do not get a boost in admission chances.
4. Some people are in the 99th percentile of income.
5. People in the 99th percentile of income get more than a 2-times boost in admission chances.
6. Some people are not legacy applicants.
7. Even if a person is not a legacy applicant, a person in the 99th percentile of income gets more than a 2-times boost in admission chances.
8. I wonder if other factors affect a person's admission.
9. Race can be a factor in admission.
10. Country of origin can be a factor in admission.
11. The current school of a student can be a factor in admission.
13. Many people in my school hope to get into Ivy League colleges.
14. Some parents of these people have an overall low income.
